page.title: 10SAILING IN PONTSTICILL
page.content: Dolygaer Outdoor Pursuits Centre near Pontsticill offers junior children the chance to sail on Pontsticill reser_ voir.So while we were in Dolygaer we had the opportunity to sail and we took it.First of all when we got onto the boat we put up the jib sail by clipping the sail onto a stay and pulling a rope down.Next we hauled up the main sail,attached to the bottom of it is a boom which fits onto the mast.We put the rudder into the water at the back of the boat and attached the tiller to it.We put the centre board into the water to make the boat go in a straight line.We released the boat from the mooring and set sail.Our instructor would shout"Ready about!" the crew shouted "All clear",then he would shout "Lee ho!"and push the tiller hard across to turn the boat.We enjoyed our day sailing very much.
